const marketplace = await ethers.getContractAt("FreelanceMarketplace", "0xe7f1725E7734CE288F8367e1Bb143E90bb3F0512");
const token = await ethers.getContractAt("PaymentToken", "0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");
console.log(token);
const token = await ethers.getContractAt("PaymentToken", "0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");
console.log(deployer.address);
const [deployer] = await ethers.getSigners();
const [deployer] = await ethers.getSigner();
console.log(deployer.address);
cosnt [deployer] = await ethers.getSigner();
